item.title: EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER (ELT) – FIXED ELT's – SYSTEM DEACTIVATED

placard.para: Install placard on top of ELT Remote Control Switch cover located on the pilot's P5 overhead control panel “FIXED ELT INOP”. Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Remote Control Switch is located in the Flight Compartment, in the pilot's P5 overhead control panel.
Ensure remote control switch is guarded and placard installed on top of switch. If switch is inoperative or guard is missing placard next to switch and perform step 2 below.

Locate Emergency Locator Transmitter (ELT). The ELT is mounted in a tray that is attached to the fuselage which is located in the aft section of the airplane (approximately station 2090), slightly forward of the L5 door in the overhead of the cargo compartment.
Move the ARMED/OFF/ON toggle switch to the off position.
